code: @Test public void testSimple() {     try {         doTest("org/apache/camel/spring/CircularComponentCreationSimpleTest.xml").         Assert.fail("Exception should have been thrown").     } catch (RuntimeCamelException e) {         Assert.assertTrue(e.getCause() instanceof FailedToCreateRouteException).     } }

// ******************************* // Test implementation // ******************************* private void doTest(String path) {     AbstractXmlApplicationContext applicationContext = null.     try {         applicationContext = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext(path).         new SpringCamelContext(applicationContext).     } finally {         IOHelper.close(applicationContext).     } }
